mapper.select: SELECT i_date legend, income, spend FROM jt_income_spend_info WHERE i_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY i_date
SELECT date_format(i_date, '%Y-%m') legend, SUM(income) income,SUM(spend) spend FROM jt_income_spend_info GROUP BY legend HAVING legend BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY legend
